p: Fourier Transform Infrared spectrometer (FTIR) analysis was done to determine the chemical interaction between the two wall reagents (CMC and BKC) by using FTIR model Spectrum 400 (PerkinElmer, MA, USA). The spectra were recorded as a wave number region with expected value ranged between 400 - 4000 cm -1 at 4 cm -1 resolution.
